import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd
source.a8ba2b0b:
colspecs = [(3, 7), (9,11),(14,18),(22,26),(32,34),(37,42),(45,50)] 
data = pd.read_fwf('../input/weather-data-armagh-n-ireland/armaghdata.txt',colspecs=colspecs)
data = data[3:].reset_index(drop=True) 
data.columns = data.iloc[1] 
data = data[3:].reset_index(drop=True)
source.9865c296:
Column headings are as follows
* yyyy = Year
* mm = Month
* tmax = Maximum temperature (Celsius)
* tmin = Minimum temperature (Celsius)
* af = Count of Air Frost days in the given month
* rain = Total rainfall (mm)
* sun = Sunshine duration (hrs)
